Where can I find more information about these false positive warnings from Avast and Kaspersky?

You can find more information about these false positive warnings from Avast and Kaspersky by reviewing the following resources: 
https://blog.malwarebytes.com/detections/pup-optional-bitcoinminer/ and 
https://www.kaspersky.com/blog/not-a-virus/18015/.

https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/fc110cfa3ab9eab71b7661628d9d0dc4fcfdb450801c41e81576a99e35244a5e/detectionAvast and Kaspersky may flag the software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP". These are warnings that you are installing mining software, which may be installed by a third party to exploit your PC.
